body.p:
CITY OF LOUISVILLE
PROGRESS
KENTUCKY
Mayor's Office,
Louisville, Ky., Septbr 18 1865
To his Excellency Governer Bramlett.

Dear Sir. Some few days ago a Certain petition was send to you in regard a remittance of a find of $500. of H. S. Barnaby for allowing in his House a Farro bank. the second Story said Barnaby was rented to a other party and he had nothing to do with that where said table was Kept. I have Known H S. Barnaby for some 12-15 years only as a truly honest and upright Man if it is possible to remitt said find please do so

I remain Most respectfully
Your Most Obt Servant.
Philip Tomppert Sr.
